derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Old Norse, literally narrative'; related to saw

entry.tran: 长篇小说;长篇故事;一连串事件
entry.def: A saga is a long story, account, or sequence of events.

example.tran: 关于 18 世纪奴隶制的总计 600 页的长篇记述

example.ex: ...the continuing saga of unexpected failures by leading companies.
example.tran: 几家龙头公司突然接连倒闭

entry.tran: 萨迦(中世纪挪威或冰岛的传奇故事)
entry.def: A saga is a long story composed in medieval times in Norway or Iceland.

example.ex: ...a Nordic saga of giants and trolls.
example.tran: 一篇关于巨人和山精的北欧萨迦

means.word_mean: 1. a narrative telling the adventures of a hero or a family; originally (12th to 14th centuries) a story of the families that settled Iceland and their descendants but now any prose narrative that resembles such an account

sentences.en: His suicide is the latest chapter in this terrible saga of greed and betrayal.
sentences.cn: 他的自杀是这部充满贪婪与背叛的可怕长篇故事的最新一章。
